languages.text: "Вам было страшно и одиноко множество лет. Но не смейте желать смерти теперь — когда я рядом, и готов дарить вам счастье день за днем!"

traits.locale_text: "Вам было страшно и одиноко множество лет. Но не смейте желать смерти теперь — когда я рядом, и готов дарить вам счастье день за днем!"

languages.text: "For all those years, fear and loneliness were all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"
languages.original_text: "Вам было страшно и одиноко множество лет. Но не смейте желать смерти теперь — когда я рядом, и готов дарить вам счастье день за днем!"

traits.locale_text: "All those years, fear and loneliness was all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"
"All those years, fear and loneliness was all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"
"All those years, fear and loneliness was all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"
"All those years, fear and loneliness was all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"
"For all those years, fear and loneliness were all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"
"For all those years, fear and loneliness were all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"

languages.text: 「数年間、あなたには恐怖と孤独しかなかった。だけどもう違う。死のうなんて考えるな！悲しみが和らぐよう、私も力を注ぐ！」
languages.original_text: "For all those years, fear and loneliness were all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"

traits.locale_text: 「数年間、あなたには恐怖と孤独しかなかった。だけどもう違う。死のうなんて考えるな！悲しみが和らぐよう、私も力を注ぐ！」

languages.text: “这么多年，你一直活在恐惧与孤独之中，但这样的日子已经结束了。别再打算一个人去死了！只要我还在你身边，我就会努力让你不再悲伤！”
languages.original_text: "For all those years, fear and loneliness were all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"

traits.locale_text: “这么多年，你一直活在恐惧与孤独之中，但这样的日子已经结束了。别再打算一个人去死了！只要我还在你身边，我就会努力让你不再悲伤！”

languages.text: «Durante todos esos años, el miedo y la soledad era todo lo que conocías. Ahora ya no. ¡No te atrevas a desear la muerte! ¡Cuando esté contigo, haré lo que sea por aliviar todas tus penas!».
languages.original_text: "For all those years, fear and loneliness were all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"

traits.locale_text: «Durante todos esos años, el miedo y la soledad era todo lo que conocías. Ahora ya no. ¡No te atrevas a desear la muerte! ¡Cuando esté contigo, haré lo que sea por aliviar todas tus penas!».

languages.text: "Ihr kanntet all die Jahre lang nur Angst und Einsamkeit. Damit ist Schluss. Wagt es ja nicht, Euch den Tod zu wünschen! Wenn ich bei Euch bin, werde ich mich bemühen, all Eure Sorgen zu lindern!"
languages.original_text: "For all those years, fear and loneliness were all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr kanntet all die Jahre lang nur Angst und Einsamkeit. Damit ist Schluss. Wagt es ja nicht, Euch den Tod zu wünschen! Wenn ich bei Euch bin, werde ich mich bemühen, all Eure Sorgen zu lindern!"

languages.text: « Depuis toutes ces années, vous n'avez connu que la peur et la solitude. Mais plus maintenant. Je vous interdis de penser à la mort ! Tant que je serai à vos côtés, je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour apaiser vos tourments ! »
languages.original_text: "For all those years, fear and loneliness were all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"

traits.locale_text: « Depuis toutes ces années, vous n'avez connu que la peur et la solitude. Mais c'est fini. Je vous interdis de penser à la mort ! Tant que je serai à vos côtés, je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour apaiser vos tourments ! »

languages.text: "Onca yıl korku ve yalnızlıktan başka bir şey bilmedin fakat artık öyle değil. Sakın ölümden medet umma! Yanında olduğum müddetçe tüm dertlerine derman olmak için canımı dişime takacağım!"
languages.original_text: "For all those years, fear and loneliness were all you knew. Not anymore. Don't you dare wish death upon yourself! When I am with you, I will strive to alleviate your every sorrow!"

traits.locale_text: "Onca yıl korku ve yalnızlıktan başka hiçbir şey bilmedin ama artık öyle değil. Sakın ölümden medet umma! Yanında olduğum müddetçe tüm dertlerine derman olmak için canımı dişime takacağım!"
